required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observatory of Unintentional Births Hospital Extras
clinical_study.official_title: Observatory of Unintentional Births Hospital Extras in Hérault

brief_summary.textblock:
In France, pre-hospital unexpected birth is a rare situation, but over the last ten years, the investigators have seen an increase in the number of these.
For this, the investigators realize an observatory of these deliveries and their care from the call for help and the investigators continue the follow-up and the future of patients and newborns until J7 postpartum.

detailed_description.textblock:
As a result, the investigators also found a very high variability in the number of deliveries per month for the EMS 34 and the SSSM of the SDIS 34, which can reach up to 11 deliveries per month (May 2014 example).
Formalized expert recommendations were published in 2010 by SFAR, which then led to the establishment of a national observatory for IEA at the end of 2011, in which the investigators have been participating for 4 years.
Currently the national database lists 2000 unannounced deliveries including 230 in the Hérault.
This observational study allows us to evaluate the management of these patients and newborns, the risks and needs of pre-hospital teams, including the need for reinforcement and expertise of midwives.
The investigators can also assess mortality and morbidity, as well as the extension of hospital stays beyond J7

primary_outcome.description: Estimate the impact of non-maternal AIE by the SMUR and the SSM in the department of Héraul, and compare it to the national overall activity

secondary_outcome.measure: Method of taking care of unannounced extra hospital deliveries
secondary_outcome.description: Method of taking care of unannounced extra hospital deliveries

secondary_outcome.measure: Difficulties during an unexpected delivery outside maternity
secondary_outcome.description: Identify the difficulties during an unexpected delivery outside maternity

secondary_outcome.measure: Risks during an unexpected delivery outside maternity
secondary_outcome.description: Identify the risks during an unexpected delivery outside maternity

secondary_outcome.measure: Possible immediate complications during an unexpected delivery outside maternity
secondary_outcome.description: Identify the possible immediate complications during an unexpected delivery outside maternity

study_pop.textblock: Unexpected delivery outside maternity in the Hérault department

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Unexpected delivery outside maternity, presence of a medical team during the care
Exclusion Criteria:
- Absence of medicalization

clinical_study.keyword: pre-hospital emergencies unannounced delivery outside maternity,
